titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: TPRG-SEND TWO YEAR CORRECTED AGE OUTCOME ASSESSMENT SCORE (NEUROLOGY QUESTION A) - Description

div.p: TPRG-SEND TWO YEAR CORRECTED AGE OUTCOME ASSESSMENT SCORE (NEUROLOGY QUESTION A) is the PERSON SCORE Â for question A of the Neurology section of the TPRG-SEND Two Year Corrected Age Outcome Assessment.
The question asks "Has this child had a fit or seizure in the past 12 months?".
